abi: function mintStory(string memory ipfsCID, string memory title, string memory category, bool isPremium) external returns (uint256)
function getStoryMetadata(uint256 tokenId) external view returns (tuple(string ipfsCID, string title, string category, bool isPremium, uint256 timestamp))
function ownerOf(uint256 tokenId) external view returns (address)
function tokenURI(uint256 tokenId) external view returns (string)

function getAllStories(uint256 offset, uint256 limit) external view returns (tuple(uint256 tokenId, string ipfsCID, string title, string category, address author, bool isPremium, uint256 timestamp)[])
event StoryMinted(uint256 indexed tokenId, address indexed author, string ipfsCID, string title)
